The move follows last month's resignation of ex-News of the World editor Andy Coulson amid continuing controversy surrounding phone-hacking allegations. The Prime Minister said: I am very pleased that Craig Oliver is to become the new Director of Communications at 10 Downing Street. Craig has formidable experience as a broadcast journalist.
